Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Do you think that US athletes are given 
olympic medals as a compensation for 
what happened in NY? 

  o Well, godammit! Of course! 
  o America is justice, so of course not! 
  o You're just jealous because Canadians don't have enough money to train good athletes. 
  o Maybe so, but wait for Canada to play Hockey! 
  o Why is Afghanistan not at these games? (I don't know if they are, actually) 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
